pageContext.claim: “And he has promised to -- and they're in the process of doing -- so when I take him for his word -- make [fentanyl trafficking] a criminal act at the highest level, which, in China, means the death penalty.”
pageContext.analysis: It's misleading to suggest fentanyl production "is not criminalized." China does have existing regulations on production and while China has yet to change the criminal designation of fentanyl, they have put restrictions around many of the chemicals needed to produce it.
